name: CATch of the Day
description:
Set in the middle of the Pacific, you are a deep-sea diver cat who catches fish and explores the ocean. Using the money earned from catching fish, you can buy upgrades to help you dive deeper and for a longer time!

Controls

WAD - Movement

SPACE - Catch fish

F - Sell and buy items when near the boat

E - Open inventory

The Team Art
  • Helen Zhang
  • Jordan Brooks
Sound
  • Kenny Zhang
Programming
  • Jerry Li
  • James Ouyang
Story

CATch of the Day is a game that we,  a team of 5 high schoolers, designed and developed, within 2 weeks in the CMU Pre-College National High School Game Academy (NHSGA) of 2020.
